answer: B: Event 5: He right-clicks, goes to Arrange, and selects "Send to Back" to place the color behind the line work.

The artist mentions sending the color to the back of the line work before highlighting and merging them together. This action is described in Event 5, where the artist right-clicks, goes to Arrange, and selects "Send to Back." This step ensures that the color is positioned behind the line work, allowing for easier highlighting and merging of the two elements later on.
